name: Seishin Destiny
description:
A very powerful demon and his army invaded the earth, only his arrival was enough to end humanity, all that was left were spirits wandering aimless forever. Years passed and the spirits found a way to take possession of bodies through masks to finally face the demons and try to get rid of the suffering of never being able to rest.

THE JOURNEY FOR FREEDOM

Go through different levels in search for the freedom of your spirit, but know that it will not be an easy task!

THE PATH IS DANGEROUS!



All kinds of Yokais will try to stop you!

gameplay[/h2]
Several different environments, each with infinite combinations of procedurally generated levels, multiple playable characters, bosses, enemies, endings and PowerUps. Graphics and animations in Pixel Art.
